channel.title: AAA TEST
channel.description: The funniest moments of Scott Mills' week from his crank phone calls to flirt divert. Hear Scott, Chappers and Laura taking revenge on people who have done wrong. Want to get rid of someone hassling you for a date? Give them Scott's flirt divert number. He'll play the best messages on his show and put them on this podcast. Subscribe to get the best clips everyday to listen to whenever you want. You can hear Scott Mills on Radio 1 in the UK Monday to Friday from 4pm. For more info and the podcast Terms of Use go to www.bbc.co.uk/radio1/podcasts
channel.itunes:author: BBC Radio 1

item.title: Mills: Dial-a-carol. 15 Dec 2006
item.description: We phone up some people in America who will sing any Christmas carol we want - but do they know that one off've The Pogues and Kirsty MacColl? It's more phone-based fun from Scott Mills on Radio 1.
item.itunes:subtitle: Mills: Dial-a-carol. 15 Dec 2006
item.itunes:summary: We phone up some people in America who will sing any Christmas carol we want - but do they know that one off've The Pogues and Kirsty MacColl? It's more phone-based fun from Scott Mills on Radio 1.
